name: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji
description: Free API to the Kanji alive web application with CC-BY licensed language data on Japanese kanji, radicals and associated media files.

api_methods.name: Kanji grade level
api_methods.description: The Advanced Search URL parameters are described here as individual endpoints to permit per parameter testing. Parameters may be combined as required.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the kanji characters taught in the 3rd grade of Japanese school?
I want to learn the kanji that are introduced in the 1st grade; please list them for me.
Find the kanji characters that 5th graders study in Japan and help me practice them.
Please provide the kanji set for the 2nd grade so I can improve my reading skills.
Could you gather the kanji characters assigned to 4th grade students for my study session?
List all the kanji that are part of the 6th grade curriculum in Japanese elementary schools.
Help me review the kanji taught in the 1st grade by showing me their meanings and strokes.
I need to memorize the kanji for the 3rd grade level; can you provide the full list?
Show me the kanji characters that are introduced in the 5th grade so I can prepare for my test.
Retrieve the kanji taught in the 4th grade to help me with my Japanese homework.
